reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Young Women Career Pathway YWCP/Gozour Foundation

description.narrative: YWCP project aims at enhancing the employability skills of 80 young beneficiary women to increase their chances to join the labour market and enhance their livelihoods. With over ten years of experience in conducting youth economic empowerment projects Goz our Foundation for Development (GFD) has managed throughout the years to persistently upgrade the content of its economic empowerment projects to be able bridge the gap between the needs of the labour market and the qualifications of the job seekers. This project will provide 80 young women with a set of interpersonal skills English language for business purposes and ICT training to be well-equipped with basic-yet main- requirements to join the labour market. The project will conduct career guidance session s which are tailored to fit each beneficiary to help them know their professional preferences and enable them to start their careers. Moreover the project will offer job placement services to the beneficiaries and attempt to connect them with a diverse nu mber of job providers. Last but not least the beneficiaries will attend self-discovery sessions to be able to break away from negative preconceptions about gender-based roles discover themselves and feel empowered to start their career paths. Given that th is project will increase the beneficiaries? economic independence and prepare them for market integration.

This project will provide 80 young women with a set of interpersonal skills English language for business purposes and ICT training to be well-equipped with basic-yet main- requirements to join the labour market. The project will conduct career guidance session s which are tailored to fit each beneficiary to help them know their professional preferences and enable them to start their careers. Moreover the project will offer job placement services to the beneficiaries and attempt to connect them with a diverse nu mber of job providers. Last but not least the beneficiaries will attend self-discovery sessions to be able to break away from negative preconceptions about gender-based roles discover themselves and feel empowered to start their career paths. Given that th is project will increase the beneficiaries? economic independence and prepare them for market integration.

tag.narrative: Generating jobs, livelihood opportunities and well-being in a developing country is the main prio rity area in this activity
Strengthening of the rights and status of women and girls is a secondary priority area in this activity
